Chapter 48: You Are the Most Beautiful in My Heart


This weekend, Wei Han had something to discuss with Leng Yan and Leng Yan took him to a horse riding field in the suburbs.


The horse field had a pleasant environment. People could breathe the fresh air, ride horses on the country roads, and feel the charm of nature. It was indeed a good place for people who lived in the city to relax.


There was a 3,000-meter straight race track and a 1,000-meter cross-country race track, as well as an approximately 30,000-square-meter of lawn equestrian training and practice venue. During weekends in the spring and autumn, there would be the occasional horse racing events.


The stables had first-class equipment, was spacious and tall, with good lighting and natural grazing combined with regular manual feeding. The horses grew well and could breed many European thoroughbred horses. Not only that, but the jockey club could also assist members in fostering, training and breeding horses. They also offer equestrian training courses taught by professional coaches.


In addition, there was also a warm and comfortable indoor swimming pool, a fully-equipped gym, a quaint and elegant tea room as well as a coffee shop, a chess room and other recreational and entertainment facilities.


Leng Yan was senior member here. He first took Wei Han to pick a horse and Wei Han chose a big brown horse, feeling that it was tall and mighty, eyes sparkling and spirited. With a glance, he could see it had a special spirit.


This was the first time Wei Han rode a horse in his life. At the beginning, he was too embarrassed to tell Leng Yan because of his face. As a result, when he started riding, he immediately felt unbalanced. He hadn’t gotten used to it yet when the uncle who was working made a yo sound and slapped its buttocks, giving the horse the command to set off.


As soon as the horse began to walk, Wei Han’s whole body jolted and swayed around, in danger of falling at any time. And not a few steps later, the ground had a wet mud pit. With the horse feet both dipping below and in the shallows, it was even worse for Wei Han who was sitting on the horse. His butt also didn’t know how to sit, and the calves were always rubbed raw with waves of pain.


Wei Han wanted to make the horse stop, but he didn’t know how to use the reins in his hands. Leng Yan on the side saw this and hurriedly helped Wei Han to pull the rope and then reached out to stroke the disobedient horse.


The brown horse seemed to feel something. The horse’s hooves stopped and it immediately lowered its head.


After seeing the horse immediately lose its spirit, Wei Han looked at Leng Yan’s cold and resolute face and his mouth pulled. He wryly smiled and said, “Six Hot, it seems like you’re really disliked by animals.”


Leng Yan silently pulled his hand back, and only coldly mm a sound.


“First time riding?” Leng Yan asked.


Wei Han gave a hollow laugh. “Yeah, Six Hot, don’t laugh at me.”


Leng Yan shook his head and then taught Wei Han some common sense of horseback riding. He told him that he only had to put the first half of the foot in the stirrups. When cantering or galloping, the calves, knees and thighs inside should be clamped firmly, and the butt didn’t need to be stuck to the saddle. If he wanted to stop, tighten the reins; if he wanted to turn left, he needed to pull the left side of the reins; and if he wanted to turn right, then he need to pull on the right side.


Wei Han nodded. According to Leng Yan’s method, he lifted the reins with both hands and clamped the belly of the horse with his legs. Then he lightly called jia and the horse began to trot and then ran faster and faster, running farther and farther away.


In the wake of the pounding of the hooves, Wei Han gradually mastered the essential of riding. The wind blowing in his hair, his heart also unconsciously became exhilarated. For the first time, he deeply felt what was called ‘galloping in the wind’.


After a while, the horse may have tired as its speed gradually slowed down. The horse that had just lowered its head and charged in a spurt of energy was now leisurely throwing its head to look around. Wei Han released a hand to gently stroke it, feeling that it was both clever and very human.


Leng Yan rode the horse over and then followed up, “Is it fun?”


“Yeah, I suddenly feel very handsome.” Wei Han smiled happily.


At the same time, although Wei Han had already notified Qi Zhifan in advance, but Qi Zhifan didn’t trust Wei Han to meet Leng Yan alone and quietly followed him.


When he was picking the horse, he happened to meet Chu Chuanyao.


“Qi…Senior Qi! H…hello!”


Not seeing Qi Zhifan for a long time, Chu Chuanyao was a bit nervous. Different from his relations with Wei Han, he was a bit afraid of Qi Zhifan. For various reasons, he’d always seen Qi Zhifan’s frowning and angry appearance.


“Why are you here?”


Qi Zhifan said coldly. Whenever he saw Chu Chuanyao’s face, Qi Zhifan always had a moment of being in a trance, but even more, he remembered the matter of Wei Han pursuing him before.


Him, Leng Yan, and Shao Yi: why were there so many ‘love rivals’?


“It’s nothing. I haven’t been riding for a long time and heard a friend said that here wasn’t bad so I came to play.”


Chu Chuanyao laughed and said. In fact, the reason why he came here was similar to Qi Zhifan’s. Qi Zhifan didn’t trust Wei Han and Chu Chuanyao was worried about Leng Yan.


“Then why did you come here, Senior Qi?”


“I’m about the same.”


Qi Zhifan fancied a black horse, while Chu Chuanyao picked a docile horse. He’d ridden a few times as a child. It had been too long now and he’d forgotten a bit, so he was less likely to be able to ride.


Qi Zhifan saw his difficulties in a glance. “To avoid any accidents, just follow me.”


“Yeah, thank you.”


On this side, Wei Han promised to help Chu Chuanyao to chase Leng Yan, so he couldn’t only do horseback riding and forget about the business.


“Then, Six Hot, you…what’s your impression of Little Yao?” Wei Han asked somewhat awkwardly.


“Stupid,” Leng Yan said straightforwardly.


Wei Han’s mouth pulled. This was too fucking direct.


He wryly laughed twice and then asked, “Is there anything else? For example, what do you think of his looks? What are some of the advantages?”


Leng Yan lowered his eyebrows and thought, also remaining silent.


Was this a difficult question? Was it necessary to think that long? Wei Han couldn’t help but ask with a thick face, “Then what’s your impression of me?”


“Stupider.”


Wei Han: “……”


“cough cough, Six Hot, why did you want to get to know me in the beginning?”


At that time, he was distressed because of his love for Qi Zhifan. After sending a help post on the same-sex dating forum, he’d received several private messages from Leng Yan the next day and he’d said that he wanted to know him. At that time, Wei Han really thought he’d met a mental case.


Leng Yan lifted his eyes and looked at Wei Han with a meaningful look: “Similar IDs.”


“……”


Uh, Wei Han swore it was genuinely random. Because Qi Zhifan had nicknamed him ‘Stomach Cold’, it had made him a bit resentful, so he simply took Stomach Very Hot Very Hot Ah.


“Besides this?”


After hearing this, Leng Yan immediately pulled out the phone and quickly typed out【I think your story was good, you can be novel material】


Wei Han’s mouth shook again and again. “Great Hot, then can you consider writing a HE in the next book?”


Leng Yan shook his head decisively, but his deep eyes suddenly shot forward, gazing far off into the distance. “Wei Han, actually, I’ve always wanted to find someone.”


Sensing Leng Yan’s earnestness and seriousness, Wei Han also straightened his face and no longer joked: “Who are you looking for? You’ve never found them?”


“My lifesaver when I was a child.”


What was this situation? Wei Han almost fell off the horse.


“Be careful!” In the next second, Leng Yan suddenly shouted, his voice suddenly rising. He saw a crazy horse with red eyes in front of him rushing straight toward them!


Leng Yan hurriedly pulled the reins and was able to the control the panic of his horse. But Wei Han didn’t have much experience. Both he and the horse were frightened, and then his horse suddenly turned around and bolted with Wei Han.


Upon seeing this, Leng Yan hurried after him and saw that Wei Han was almost thrown off by a rough bump. He stretched out his right arm and held him in the desperate moment, pulling Wei Han into his arms and letting Wei Han sit steady on his horse.


Then, several staff members emerged and quieted down the two horses.


Sitting in front of Leng Yan, Wei Han patted his chest, still a little shaken. “Thank…thank you, Six Hot.”


Leng Yan shook his head and carefully reminded, “It’s okay. You have to pay attention next time.”


“Mhm,” Wei Han, with immense gratitude, smiled back at Leng Yan.


“Wei Han!”


“Big Brother Wei.”


When Qi Zhifan and Chu Chuanyao appeared, they saw this intimate scene where Leng Yan was holding Wei Han and the two were riding on one horse.


In the evening, Wei Han and Qi Zhifan returned home, and seeing that Qi Zhifan always had a cold face, Wei Han had more and more of a headache, feeling that wherever he went, he could clearly smell the scent of an overturned jar of vinegar.


“Good Trouble, don’t be angry. Being angry is bad for the body,” Wei Han smiled ingratiatingly and leaned over to hammer and massage Qi Zhifan’s shoulders.


“And don’t always knit your brows. This doesn’t look good.”


Wei Han said while tracing Qi Zhifan’s long eyebrows with his fingers. Facing the Great Beauty Qi’s face made Wei Han a bit ‘smitten’. His family’s Trouble was really a natural-born beauty, even when he was angry, he was still so good-looking. If he was willing to laugh, then there was no need to mention.


Thinking about it, Wei Han couldn’t help but sing: “You’re the most beautiful in my heart, every smile makes me intoxicated…”


Qi Zhifan: “……”


“Stop singing, unpleasant to death!”


Somehow, even though Wei Han singing was out of tune and sung randomly, Qi Zhifan’s mouth scolded, but a hint of joy rose in his heart. He must absolutely be crazy.


“No, I just want to sing…uh uhh…”


Words hadn’t finished when Wei Han’s mouth was blocked by Qi Zhifan’s kiss, his entire person also caught in Qi Zhifan’s arms, causing Wei Han to cling to his chest and feel his strong heartbeat.


For a time, they kissed each other and were loathed to part. Qi Zhifan not only stole Wei Han’s breath, but also used his tongue to stir, sometimes entangling Wei Han’s little tongue, but also greedily sucking his pure and sweet, fragrant saliva. With the intentions to punish, he vowed to kiss Wei Han until his whole body went soft before he would be willing to give up.


Entangled for a while, this overbearing kiss went on until Wei Han was gasping for breath before it ended.


“Wei Han, I still need to punish you.” The color of Qi Zhifan’s eyes were extremely dark, strongly pulsing with something.


“Punish…what punishment?”


At last able to breathe in fresh air, Wei Han’s poor lips had been bitten red and swollen, and it was moistened and glistening seductively with bodily fluid.


“Punish you to help me quench the fire.”


Words finished, Qi Zhifan pulled Wei Han’s hand and dragged it slowly over his chest and lower abdomen, all the way down to explore his crotch and that prominently jutting bulge.


Wei Han’s hand stopped for a moment. Feeling Qi Zhifan’s terrible size and heat, the heart in his chest cavity crazily jumped, and he hung his head, thinking of the many shameful postures in bed.


“Be obedient.”


Qi Zhifan said once again, his voice slowly becoming low and husky.


Wei Han flushed with excitement and had to kneel down. He pulled Qi Zhifan’s zipper down and lowered his head, using his mouth to suck Qi Zhifan’s hard and fiery thing. Immediately, the strong taste that belonged exclusively to Qi Zhifan assaulted his senses, stimulating Wei Han’s nostrils and making his lower abdomen also impatiently heat up.


His small mouth was crammed full. The inexperienced Wei Han didn’t know much techniques, and he could only slowly lick it and at the same time, use his hands to gently rub the two round sacks below.


A burst of numbing currents came from below and dispersed all the way through his body. Enjoying the “special service”, Qi Zhifan’s eyes became more still, that place also becoming even more enlarged and hard, further propping open Wei Han’s mouth. He also deliberately thrust deep into Wei Han’s throat, making Wei Han’s eyes suddenly overflow with a bit of tears.


Still feeling sorry for Wei Han, Qi Zhifan drew out a breath before he pulled out his fiery heat. However, he didn’t intend to let Wei Han off like this. He saw that Wei Han seemed to be very happy when he was riding the horse today, why not…


Patting his thighs, Qi Zhifan gave Wei Han a meaningful glance: “Come sit up here.”


Wei Han stared blankly for a moment. In fact just now, it had also raised his own fire below, so he obediently parted his legs, took a few deep breaths and then slowly and carefully, tentatively sat down.


In a flash, there was a tearing pain. Wei Han only took in the first half of Qi Zhifan, and he felt that it wouldn’t be easy for him to completely take it all in.


“Be good, re…relax a little…” It was so tight that even Qi Zhifan wasn’t feeling better. He licked Wei Han’s ears, one hand tenderly stroking the penis in front, soothing and encouraging him.


Slowly, Wei Han’s pain diminished and his sense of pleasure climbed up again. Seeing Qi Zhifan in front of him with his forehead clearly covered in a layer of fine sweat and surely must have endured very hard, Wei Han clenched his teeth and then firmly sank his waist down. In an instant, the pain of being torn and the feeling of being filled simultaneously rushed to Wei Han’s brain.


After that, Qi Zhifan’s waist continued to rise up, ramming into the deeper places. With an intense sense of crushing, it almost felt like Wei Han’s heart and lungs were almost bumped out, the inside unceasingly spread open by a foreign body. Wei Han only felt that the heat had already burned him from his head to his feet. His mouth cried out in a burst of broken sounds, and the front was also erect, ramrod straight and eager for release.


Finally, when Wei Han’s back was slammed by burst after burst of electric currents, even his toes couldn’t help curling up, and a white liquid sprayed out. At the same time, another heat flow also poured into his body, heating Wei Han to tremble all over in confusion, also becoming sticky between his thighs.


At this moment, both of their brains were blank, holding each other and gasping for breath.


Arms around Qi Zhifan’s neck, Wei Han whispered, somewhat shy to say: “Odd Trouble, when you see Little Yao, would you think of…”


Would you think of your unsuccessful first love, think of Ou Yizhe?


QI Zhifan immediately understood what he meant. “Yes, but I will remember even more that there was a fool who told me how much he liked Chu Chuanyao, but also vowed to that he must catch him.”


Wei Han was startled and could only helplessly force out two laughs, “Haha, Odd Trouble, you have a good memory.”


“I’ve always had a good memory, especially for you.”


The words Qi Zhifan blurted out instantly caused Wei Han to blush. He burrowed into Qi Zhifan’s bosom. “Odd Trouble, I used to be a fool before.”


“Are you quite self-aware?”


Wei Han lowly hummed an agreement, making Qi Zhifan a little surprised. Unexpectedly, this fool actually didn’t say a word to refute this time?


“Hey, don’t sulk by yourself.” Qi Zhifan patted him.


Wei Han shook his head. “I’m not mad.”


In the past, he’d felt more than once that he was really unlucky to run into Qi Zhifan in his two lifetimes. But now, he found out how lucky he was.
